page.title: 16LIGHT INDUSTRY
page.content: The change from reliance on heavy industry to a more varied and lighter base is now visible in{South Bank and {Grangetown.}The land needed for the expansion of light industries has been obtained by the conversion of derelict land and the clearance of older housing.These schemes form part of the {Langbaurgh Councils}scheme for {industrial regeneration.}The scheme was instituted to entice companies from outside the area to set up in the Langbaurgh area and so bring additional employment opportunities into a{depressed area.}In order to attract new industries into the area the government and council offered incentives to any firm taking up units.Like other industrial estates in the Cleveland area ,a full occupancy rate has not yet been achieved.
